question.questionText: Greta used her hand to measure the length of the whiteboard in her classroom. She found that it was 14 hands long. Andre measured the whiteboard and found that it was 16 hands long. Explain why Greta and Andre got different measurements.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Greta and Andre have different sized hands.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Greta's hand is probably longer than Andre's hand.
Because Greta's hands are small. And Andre's hands are big.
Because they are older than the other and their hand have different hands, or one of them opened their finger and the other did not.
